title: Kate's chickpea curry
ingredients: ['oil for frying', '2 onions, diced', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 to 1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon garam masala']
